value.name: Lawsuit Alleges County Election System Dilutes Latino Votes
value.description: The lawsuit alleges that Washington state's county election system deters a strong Latino vote by splitting a predominantly Latino district into three. The redistricting won’t be confirmed until after the 2020 Census data is released.
